PageWidgetPortable.Title: Pré-contratos a aprovar
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>PORTAL_CLI_APROVAR_PRECONTRATOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 2 AND A.PESSOA IN (SELECT PESSOA FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalCliente/a/Contratos/Precontrato/VisualizarPreContratos.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
